snippet.title: Shadows on the Vatican: Nightingale - Trailer
snippet.description:
Writing on a blog and using her obscure ability, the mysterious Nightingale has been helping people in danger for years. Now, she’s forced to disappear, facing threats from a killer... one of those people she helped in the past.

"Shadows on the Vatican: Nightingale" is an interactive short story. 
Available now on Steam.


https://store.steampowered.com/app/1182530/Nightingale
https://www.shadowsonthevatican.com
https://www.nightingale-game.com
